snippet.title: My Little Pony: A Zephyr Heights Mystery - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's the launch trailer for My Little Pony: A Zephyr Heights Mystery, the new 3D platform adventure game developed by Drakhar Studio. Players will attempt to tame the strange and unstable magic causing mayhem in Zephyr Heights. Embody Sunny, Hitch, Izzy, Pipp, Zipp, or Misty and use special abilities to explore the cloud kingdom full of exciting quests and collectibles. My Little Pony: A Zephyr Heights Mystery is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#MyLittlePony #Gaming #Games
